resources.string: 1. The US has won more Summer Olympic medals than any other country?
2. Which US city has hosted the Summer Olympics twice?
3. Who is the most decorated US Olympic athlete?
4. What 1960 Olympic champion lit the torch to start Atlanta\'s 1996 Olympic festivities?
5. How many gold medals did Mark Spitz win at the 1972 games?
6. Which US Diver won the gold medal at the 1988 games despite hitting his head on the board on the way down?
7. In what year did the US boycott the Summer Olympic games?
8. Of the following, who were members of the 1992 US Men\'s Olympic basketball team?
9. Mary Lou Retton won the Olympic gold medal in which sport in 1984?
10. In what sport was the US Olympic team nicknamed the "Dream Team"?
